website_summaries.verdict: The Vizio E701i-A3 is the best value yet among 70-inch LED TVs.
pros: The Vizio E701i-A3 is an outstanding value as the least expensive LED TV of its size that also offers Smart TV
Its picture boasts highly accurate color and very good bright-room performance
Plenty of Smart TV content is on hand within a responsive interface, and the QWERTY remote makes searches and other Smart TV actions easier
With its thin bezel, the set has a more compact, sleeker look than many competitors
cons: The E1i-A3's picture can't match the black-level performance of some competing LED TVs, and suffers from some uniformity issues
Its Smart TV interface design seems a bit dated and cumbersome

customer_reviews.title: Barely lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV from Amazon less than a year and a half ago and it has recently started making popping noises and at times the top half of the screen will go white. After reading the other recent reviews on this model, this seems like a common problem - and a quick Google search confirms that certain SN's for this model have been recalled. My serial number is not listed, but the problems with the set are the same. I have reached out to Vizio and will update this review based on my experience there. Recall Information:
customer_reviews.author: DismissedasDrone

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy unless you like white spots all over your TV.
customer_reviews.text: Develops white spots all over the tv panel - see the pic. Contacted Vizio twice for 2 replacements!!! All of them developed the same white spots. The warranty is only for 1 year. When white spots developed again on the 2nd replacement (which occurred again right after the warranty expired), contacted Vizio for resolution. They offered discounted replacement pricing on a new E70u-d3 for $1200. I passed for obvious reasons. $1600 on a new tv should last more than a 1 year warranty. Do not buy a Vizio. There's a reason they are the cheapest. High hopes but utter disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jamborghini

customer_reviews.title: I've really enjoyed this television
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I've really enjoyed this television. What first attracted me was the size and price. After owning it for awhile though, I've begun to get spots on the screen where light fades through. It's not the biggest deal in the world, but I'm a person who can't help but to focus on those type of things once I notice them. The Smart aspect of the television could be quite a bit better. Very slow/clunky to use. We just use an Apple TV through it and ignore it all together now. Overall, would recommend at a good price. Otherwise, there are better out there for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Sold a faulty model, now out of warranty and I'm out $
customer_reviews.text: Screen just went black, sound still works and I'm told I'm out of warranty. Of course looking around it now turns out this Vizio TV model has this problem! I guess they knowingly sold this model without warning of this fault and now 3 years later it's completely done. If I'd known when purchasing it had problems I would have had it serviced for the new part while under warranty! Shame on Amazon for selling a recalled TV.
customer_reviews.author: nclinds

customer_reviews.title: This TV is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV. Got it for a great price and it was delivered, set up and trash removed. No complaints at all. I'm not one of those crazy people that comment on all of the technical aspects of TV sets. I have a Sharp 60" in my family room and my husband decided he wanted a 70" for his man cave. After browsing around I settled on this one as all of our previous TV's were Vizio brand and we had never had a problem with any of them. I thought the Sharp had the best picture but after having both now for over six months I can't complain about either. They both look good to me.
customer_reviews.author: LMJAX11

customer_reviews.title: I love my TV
customer_reviews.text: I had a 50 inch panasonic LCD rear projection tv for about 9 years. The picture was good, but I found myself hoping it would die so I could upsize. This Vizio was a deal I couldn't refuse. 70 inches and I feel like I'm in the movie theater. No problems so far, great picture, thin depth and small bezel. I couldn't be happier. The price point is just right for the technology. Amazon delivery was flawless and they got it going for me. Costco was pricier, an exta charge fir delivery, and they were just going to drop it at my front door. I love Amazon prime!
customer_reviews.author: Music buff

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It is very bright...almost too bright for me. I changed the settings a little to make it darker but it still looks bright. I like the fact that you could watch downloaded videos on it by plugging in a flash drive. I have not tested MKV files out yet though. My wife said that the TV (I SAID THE TV) did not look as big as she thought it would in our basement. I guess I should have went with the 80 incher. I am satisfied...it sure beats my old Toshiba 62 inch projection tv (62HM95 was the model, not like it matters). I do not really care about the apps on there. Adios muchachos.
customer_reviews.author: B Ryan Like the Bird

customer_reviews.title: It's the price...
customer_reviews.text: I can't really say anything bad about this set, given that the price was so cheap. I'd had other big picture sets with a clearer picture and with all the whistles, but I paid 3 times the amount and they barely outlasted the warranty. This is a great disposable unit, when it dies it goes in the trash and I will buy another and still be ahead. If you read any other reviews fussing about this and about that - they need to pay a lot more money to get what they want. This an excellent purchase and the picture is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Campla

customer_reviews.title: Good TV
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value in a large TV. With a high quality high definition source, the picture is very good. However, a screen this large will cause flaws in the source to be much more visible. I find that motion blur in some Dish Network high definition channels is much more annoying on this TV than my smaller TV's. The motion blur is caused by Dish Network compression, not by the TV. One other issue is some non-uniform backlighting along the bottom edge of the screen. However, this is only noticeable with a solid white background. Overall, I recommend this TV
customer_reviews.author: JCK

customer_reviews.title: This is a disappointing product. The first unit broke ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a disappointing product. The first unit broke around 11 months (normal usage, 2-3 hours a day), the bottom left corner of the screen just blacked-out so they sent me a replacement. The replacement was OK but after the warranty expires it started showing "dead/stuck pixels". In the beginning I didn't mind since there was 1 or 2 and it's close to the bottom but now it's a mess (15+ stuck pixel), there's 1 close to the middle of the screen and I can't stand it. I'll never buy Vizio again, never!!
customer_reviews.author: KDramaAdik

customer_reviews.title: PRICE DROPPED 5% RIGHT AFTER I PURCHASED TV.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased via Amazon and received very good service from order to delivery. Came sooner than promised. Problem price dropped and cannot reach Amazon human to discuss and cannot get reply from emails. Too old to figure it out. My wife and I are very pleased. OH, no owners manual or instruction book. Have to get off TV but no instructions how to do it. Guess we should have tried 24/7 (800) #? jimmytkbarns@bak.rr.com, Bakersfield, Ca.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy "TK" Barns

customer_reviews.title: 70 inches of joy
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong for a 70 inch led tv for less than $1600. The quality of the picture is amazing after applying some calibration settings. Colors really pop and blacks are decent for an edge lit led. Don't really notice any motion blur even with soap opera effect turned off. I sit about 9 feet away and it's perfect. Not to big not to small. Delivery guys did an awesome job bring it in the family room and putting it on the stand. I highly recommend this tv to anyone looking for quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Vizio won't stand behind the product even with known defects
customer_reviews.text: The set was great for the first two years, then started developing white spots in the lower left hand side of the screen. I called Vizio and while they know about this problem and extended the warranty to 2 years for other owners, since I mine was a little over 2.5 years, all they would do is offer to sell me a new TV at a discount. I expect more than 2.5 years of life from a TV and that a manufacturer would stand behind known problems. Vizio did not.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H.

customer_reviews.title: Best Price for a 70" on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and color if you know how to set one up right. This is my 3rd Vizio, so I know my settings well. When watching a movie or shows, the backlighting doesn't allow the black color to be truly black; however, that will be the least of your concerns. Great size (measure 62" wide and 69" or so diagonally), but you will need a good tv stand if you aren't mounting this thing. Yes, do as it says and have another person help you. It is not too heavy (109 lbs) but is odd to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors displayed!!
customer_reviews.text: The channels that are in HD and the movies played on our blu ray disc player are gorgeous. I bought this t.v for my Husband for his birthday and we were a bit concerned that it is a 70 inch with 120Hz and though it may display blury. But we gave it a shot and it's a keeper. Amazon did a great job with the delivery and we actually had it in time to watch the fights and the big game this weekend. Our friends and family enjoyed it as well. It feels like you are at the movies and when watching a college or pro game it feels like you are at the actual game! Its a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya A Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, but a little trick to set it up
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. To get low-latency (low-lag) mode, set the INPUT to "GAME" mode. Setting the "PICTURE" to "GAME" mode does nothing except fiddle the colors a little. You must set the INPUT to "GAME" mode - that sets it in low-lag mode. Confusing, I know. I almost returned it.
customer_reviews.author: David Lindbergh

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome value at any price. I typically never buy the cheapest electronics on the market no regrets with this purchase. This had every feature I wanted, Thin bezel allows it to fit in more places. I set this up with some led backlighting, looks great! I only use 1 HDMI connection bc my reciever is the brains. On/off is programmable with the direcTV remote so there is no need for a universal. Definitely recommend to friends that want to step up their living room HT! Excellent picture quality!
customer_reviews.author: Ttuned

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Went and shopped TV's at Costco then bought the same one on Amazon for a couple hundred cheaper. I love this TV. Picture is great. Only complaint is the "smart TV" interface is horrible. I still use a Roku box just to avoid the internal Smart TV app that comes with the TV. I would definitely buy this TV again.
customer_reviews.author: Just Some Dude Who Buys Stuff on Amazon. A lot.

customer_reviews.title: WOW !!  Simply amazing
customer_reviews.text: I just LOVE it! The picture is awesome. Almost looks like 3D sometimes. The perfect centerpiece to my home theatre! The internet apps work fine, but are a bit slow and not all that user friendly. I have a Roku and still use it prodominatly. But all-in-all I could not be happier with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: B. Berryhill

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: I had been eyeing this TV in Wal mart for awhile trying to decide if I was going to purchase. I looked it up on Amazon and got it for the same price, no tax and no shipping. If I haad purchased from Wal-mart it would have cost me $ 1750 with tax and shipping. I love the picture on this TV. My boyfriend especially love graphics when he is watching Football. He stayed in the basement all day Sunday watching Football. I would highly recommend this TV to anyone inquiring
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Fields

customer_reviews.title: Defective TV, Terrible Customer Service from Vizio,
customer_reviews.text: Started to get white dots on it. Kept getting worse and worse. Contacted Vizion and they offered me a nice appology, but said the TV is out of warranty and they can not do anything to help. My advise is to stay away from Vizio.
customer_reviews.author: April Walker

customer_reviews.title: A great TV, great pricing, great delivery. Thanks Amazon !!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say but to agree with all of the positive things that have been said about this TV & be thankful that we have experienced none of the negative things. Thanks Amazon for a faultless buying experience from the sale price of $1,599, thru the ontime delivery, easy set up, & the pleasure of seeing our favorite shows in life like size. WOW !!
customer_reviews.author: M. A. French

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: awesome TV, bought in 11/2013, still works today despite reading reviews that the screen would show issues or die out after a year. hangs on the wall, used often. great display, great speakers (louder than most flat screen tv's i've come across. great size... just overall impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: TV came in perfect working order and looks terrific. No dead pixels, great picture in various types of light. Lots of people reported remote control problems with this model, but no such problems with mine. Remote works find and is easy to use. My guess is the remote has been improved in response to previous problems. Amazon's freight forwarder of choice was prompt and helpful. Shipping carton was in good condition. No problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: iBane

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't all that impressed with the delivery. The guy plugged it in to make sure no pixels were out but he didn't put it on the stand which was less than a foot away. It sat on the middle of my floor for hours until my husband was able to get home and help me put it up on the stand. The TV is awesome and has everything we wanted in it.
customer_reviews.author: amy lynn hall

customer_reviews.title: VIZIO IS WHERE IT'S AT
customer_reviews.text: A GREAT TV. This Vizio 70 inch tv, I gave to my mother and she enjoys it very much. My mom's 86 years old and its simple for her to operate. This is my first Vizio Tv and will not be my last. I was very surprised with the quality and performance from this product for the PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: AJ GONZO

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this TV. It is a good value for the price. My only complaint is that I did not like the preset picture modes; I did not think they showed a good picture. I tweaked the settings using the Disney World of Wonder Blu-ray disk, and I am very happy with the picture now. White glove delivery service was good.
customer_reviews.author: Catnap

customer_reviews.title: Does not stand the test of reliability.
customer_reviews.text: We had this TV for two years and it died! While watching it the picture simply faded away. The picture would not come back on. When the company was contacted they said it would cost more to fix than to replace. WHAT! Considering how much it cost that was not going to happen. The representative said we would be better off throwing it away. WHAT! I cannot recommend buying anything Vizio!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered for my husband. He had a 65 inch 3D TV and long story short he did not care for the 3D. We saw this TV at a great price though Amazon so we ordered it. Hubby did use a review on here to get the right settings (which were perfect by the way) because out of the box settings are terrible.The TV has a beautiful picture, and I recommend it to anyone that is thinking about purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristilis

customer_reviews.title: Best TV yet.
customer_reviews.text: And it's my 3rd flat screen. Best value, picture, apps, adjustability, and bang for your buck. Amazon prime finally makes sense. And did again this week when my wife broke our Breville Coffee maker. Don't bother with any other TV set. I own a Sony, an LG, and now this. Vizio hands down the clear cut winner. Click add to cart, and you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Yardis

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture
customer_reviews.text: The picture and clarity is great. TV broke down on the second day of operation however. Vizio replaced all the main electronics boards and now it works great. If you buy one save the box and all your paper work as you will need it to send information on them to Vizio to verify your purchase. Amazon . com was great as all the paperwork was in My account. I would recommend this TV to anyone I intended to keep as a friend. Buy a sound bar for this TV as the internal sound is not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Fryer

customer_reviews.title: VIZIO 70 inch LED RAZOR
customer_reviews.text: TV is so bright I'm tempted to adjust brightness setting but I'm fairly sure I won't. It is a joy to watch, makes small scoreboard apps easy to read, and with the what I'll call the crawler apps is much more than just a TV.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Gruenwald

customer_reviews.title: Awesome- Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This TV arrived as promised from the date. The shipping company even emailed and called to confirm on the delivery day. The packaging was perfect and no issues with the TV. The TV is beautiful. It is very slim and hangs on the wall nicely. The picture very good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: From Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV , company based in CA too!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Vizio product purchase and really like it. Nice picture, able to "keep up" with sporting events (even though it is only a 120 refresh rate, it does good), great detail. I am running FiOS through it and am very happy. Caught it on a nice deal and will buy more of their products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I've had the TV for 15 months, and already ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had the TV for 15 months, and already the backlight has stopped working on a little over a quarter of the screen. Very disappointing, this will be the last Vizio I ever purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Greg White

customer_reviews.title: As a Smart TV, not a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: After having this product for just over one year the Smart TV feature of the product stopped working. I have been unable to connect to the Internet for the last three months with the features of the TV. Although the product was out of warranty I called the Visio service center to see if I could get the feature to work again. The customer service representative knew virtually nothing about the product. As a Smart TV this was not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great TV at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Vizio. We have a 21" in our bedroom. The picture of this 70" is wonderful. This coupled with our surround sound system makes watching television even more enjoyable. The controls on the remote are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: HRKC

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth every inch, er penny!
customer_reviews.text: I have two 55 inch TV's, one a TCL and the other LG and while they are also both fantastic sets, this one far beats it obviously on size but the picture is simply amazing. It was effortless to get on WiFi and I can not rave enough about the value and the picture. I didn't think Vizio could deliver such an amazing product but they did! .. If you want a 70", the price is right and you will not be dissapointed .. I sure wasn't!
customer_reviews.author: Philip S. Talpers

customer_reviews.title: Defective - Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with the TV until it died less than two years after purchase. Searching the web it turns out this model is defective and was recalled. I'm certainly regretting this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great picture...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the TV for two (2) months & I'm very pleased. It replaced a Mitzibishi 65". It connected to my Wi-Fi very easy.The remote control could have been a little b etter designed, but don't let that stop you from purchasing this TV if you can get it at a good price... Ken
customer_reviews.author: Ken L. Barber

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the things that drew me to this TV was it's price, what made me purchase it was all the reviews from other satisfied customers. Now I know why they love their Vizio. What surprised me even more than the picture itself was the sound coming out of it, the speakers on this thing are incredible, almost like a sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Excellent large screen TV
customer_reviews.text: I luv my TV. I can't wait till NFL season starts in August! Lot's of features and easy to get "tuned" to the lighting in my room with great advise from other users on the web and Amazon. I think this TV is a Great Value and I would recommend to others as I'm happy that I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Los

customer_reviews.title: Vizio ripoff!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought our 1st 70 inch e-series vizio in june of 2013. It failed, (red line on left side of screen),in 4 months. They replaced it with a new version which just failed, (went black),10 months later. So, I call the service dept. & they tell me the warranty only applies to 1st purchase date which ended last month!!! Isn't that nice? Don't buy one!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: first went bad in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: will never buy another vizio... first went bad in 6 months.... second one made it through the 1 year warranty and then went out... customer service said sorry, you pay to get it fixed... sitting on the side of the road waiting on the garbage man to pick it up...sure hope this helps, mike in la
customer_reviews.author: mike kendrick

customer_reviews.title: My advice is to buy additional extended warranty due to its unreliable quality if you love this TV and the name VIZIO
customer_reviews.text: This Vizio 70" died after 13 months of normal usage, and the warranty only covers one year. There is the sound, but no picture at all, and the TV is still in pristine condition. My advice is to buy additional extended warranty due to its unreliable quality if you love this TV and the name VIZIO. My previous TV were Samsung, Sharp, and LG which performed well beyond expectation, at least 4 to 5 years before something went wrong. I regretted to spend nearly $2000 for this junk from VIZIO.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: but after few months contacted Vizio and was given the obligatory "can't help you" and given the amount of postings on the web a
customer_reviews.text: After 14 months the infamous white spots started showing up and had hoped they'd solve themselves, but after few months contacted Vizio and was given the obligatory "can't help you" and given the amount of postings on the web about the issues with white dots I expected a better support from them.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for price
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a big TV and had no interest in 3D so this was a great deal. Picture is great. Audio is fair. We'll eventually hook it up to a better sound system. The 1 touch to launch Amazon Prime is nice. The App interface is a little dated. No HBO Go available on this model. It would be nice, since it has a full QUERTY keyboard on the remote to have a web browser built into the monitor, but it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: bostonluke

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: 70", thin and light, internet connectivity, great picture, functional remote, what's not too love!? IMO Vizio hit it out of the park with this one. Great quality for the price paid, Squaretrade warranty give piece of mine, and amazon white glove delivery kept me from hauling it up the stairs to the media room. VERY happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe J.

customer_reviews.title: setup simple
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know that the delivery would also take it out of the box, and hook everything up. So when the delivery men offered, I wasn't comfortable with them doing it... and did it myself. female grandmother.
customer_reviews.author: K. O. Kalina

customer_reviews.title: I brought this TV in April 2013 for $1700. ...
customer_reviews.text: I brought this TV in April 2013 for $1700.00 and it just blew. I called Vizio and they stated that the unit cannot be fixed and had the audacity to offer me a 55 inch TV for $900.00 as a replacement. The representative stated that if the black light on the rear of this model goes it cost more to repair than replace. What a joke, I have 2 Sony TVs 1 60 and another 46 that were brought in 2010 and 2011 respectively that are still going strong. Stay away from this brand!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Herbert T. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TV
customer_reviews.text: I got this TV during a flash deal on Amazon. Amazon shipping was great. The default picture settings on this is a little bad. A quick adjustment and the picture turns out amazing. This is a huge TV and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last long was dead within a year and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Dad

customer_reviews.title: Runs all of the apps needed to watch your favorites ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs all of the apps needed to watch your favorites, and plenty that you won't need. I don't know why I ever had a smaller TV. Product was delivered with care, brought into my home, set up and tested for me. You can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony and Sarah P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Purchased April 2013 and the picture has already gone bad. There are white spots all over the screen and getting worse. From what I've read it has something to do with how the pixels are controlled and there is NOT a fix for it. Disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: MoTown

customer_reviews.title: Vizio TVs good for price
customer_reviews.text: We like the Vizio's. Nice picture and decent sound out of the tv speakers for the price. White glove service for delivery was awesome and included. They made sure tv was working. Only bad comment is the internet is hard to keep connected and you need an N-router to even have a hope of connecting. So far I've had to reconnect each time I want access but maybe I'm missing a setting. once connected apps are slow to load but I think this seems to be the case for all devices except idevices and the ps3.
customer_reviews.author: FoxyGma

customer_reviews.title: This model is defective and had a recall. The ...
customer_reviews.text: This model is defective and had a recall. The TV died as the defect described. I called Vizio to handle the recall. The first guy tells that because of the recall the warranty was extended and that me I am covered and to send in the receipt and pictures as proof. Then Vizio calls back and tells me I am not covered because Amazon did not fulfill it through an authorized retailer. So now I have giant paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great 70" LED
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 LED TV's, most 3d and this one. Overall this is a great TV, and now my main TV. Quality impressive, price impressive, picture impressive, built in Aps, impressive, overall, recommend to anyone looking for large yet thin quality LED TV, Vizio has stepped it up again!
customer_reviews.author: Geohippo

customer_reviews.title: Great Display for Wall Mounting Solution
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a family member that needed help with mounting and setup. I went to Sam's Club and bought the wall mount after getting the TV from Amazon and checking out the screw holes in the back. The setup mounted well and the TV looks great on a wall with a 12-15' distance from the display to seat.
customer_reviews.author: D J Ryff

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!  Mine didn't last 2 years and they do nothing for you.
customer_reviews.text: I Loved it until it died the Sunday after Thanksgiving. It isn't even 2 years old till Feb 14th, 2015. Then I had to paid $212 dollars to find out oh yeah your TV is dead and you have the biggest paperweight. I will never buy Vizio Again. This was my first experience with them and will be my last.
customer_reviews.author: Flirtara

customer_reviews.title: VIZIO E701i-A3 70-inch 1080p 120Hz Razor LED Smart HDTV
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful television picture, size and quality are all excellent. The price was excellent and I highly recommend this television to anyone who is looking for a big screen smart tv for a good price. The only reason I couldn't rate it a full 5 stars is because the sound quality is good but not great i.e. the bass is marginal at best.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Warren

customer_reviews.title: Best 1599 i ever spent.
customer_reviews.text: I got this from amazon for 1599 shipped with no tax. It is thinner and lighter than my 55 inch full array 3D. The picture is excelent after you play with the settings a little. For the price you absolutely can not beat this TV. I like the picture better than the 70" sharp and it is a ton cheaper. The smooth motion works almost too good sometimes. If the price ever drops down that cheap again, jump at the opportunity. That is all.
customer_reviews.author: Nardonir

customer_reviews.title: Broke already.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tv in Nov 2013 and it already needs repairs. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: F. Mcduffie

customer_reviews.title: Vizio 70"
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and picture but the sports programs I have watched get a little choppy. All in all I am quite happy for the price. It's funny how a massive 70" tv seemed giant when I got it. Now it seems like a normal size and I want an 85"!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Vandy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I received the TV in perfect condition. It was really inexpensive so I was kind of worried about the quality but I have no problems with it. The picture is sharp, it sounds good, my internet works great on it. I love it. Highly recommend this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: 70 inch Visio tv
customer_reviews.text: The size and clarity is perfect for my room. I replaced a 50 inch plasma. The wifi is great and the automatic tie in with Amazon Prime., Netflix etc. is very handy. If you want to upgrade to a larger Tv in an affordable price range I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Kimes

customer_reviews.title: Vizio E701i-A3 Buying Experience
customer_reviews.text: I had a Mitsubishi 65" DLP that I bought in 2006. It was a great TV. But after replacing 2 bulbs I bought on ebay in 3 weeks I figured it was time. So, I did an exhaustive search for a TV that was at least 65" but preferably larger.That's when I stumbled onto this TV. I bought it for $1699 and it was delivered within 3 days for free as part of prime membership. After 3 hours (had to acclimate) fired it up and great picture, wow. No regrets. However after 1 week, the price dropped $100.00. I submitted a low price claim and was credited that money. Thanks Amazon. If you are hesitating, don't.
customer_reviews.author: Arcrider

customer_reviews.title: Great pic
customer_reviews.text: Very good picture,looks like people are standing in your living room, don't know why the Put the speakers in the back? Sound is not quality had too spend 300$ more to hear Tv well , bought vizo sound bar,, it's good!
customer_reviews.author: BRECIAK

customer_reviews.title: originally arrived damaged, but the people delivering the tv ...
customer_reviews.text: originally arrived damaged, but the people delivering the tv discovered the issues and replaced it promptly. the new tv works great
customer_reviews.author: StepDo

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 3 years and the video failed, this ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 3 years and the video failed, this is a known issue for Vizio 60 and 70 inch TV's. If you are buying anything over 55 inch don't look at Vizio.
customer_reviews.author: John A.

customer_reviews.title: Gianormous!
customer_reviews.text: This TV is great! The LED picuture is fluent and has great color. Vizio did a super job designing this television. Because this tv is so big, don't expect to have excellent sound. Most likely, you will also need to buy a separate sound system to add to make it a perfect theater experience. The trucking company that shipped the tv was right on time and did a nice job! Thank you Amazon! Merry Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Visio 70"
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine told me about Visio and the price Amazon was selling them for. I had a Sony 60", but it was not really in high definition. This one made me feel like I was playing in the Super Bowl. Since buying it I have recommended it to several people.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Harbour

customer_reviews.title: 70"  TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought one at sam's and liked it so much, I bought one for my brother for the same price including delivery. The wall mount I bought from amazon for under $30 worked awesome too.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: so far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Not the best TV on the market, but for the price you can't beat it. Sometimes Netflix will freeze it up, but just do a reset and it'll start working again.
customer_reviews.author: Shambles

customer_reviews.title: Great tv. I don't use any of the "smart ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tv. I don't use any of the "smart features" but the screen looks great from a distance.
customer_reviews.author: MomofTwo

customer_reviews.title: terrible smart tv. good value for size.
customer_reviews.text: I will start off by saying this tv completely fails as a smart tv. It comes preloaded with netflix which would be great except for it lacks the processor speed necessary to actually stream anything. Lacks a net browser and the only thing that I hsve found to work well is pandora. Fortunately this is not why I bought the tv. I got it because of the picture size and price. The picture is a good quality and has very little lag watching sports.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Tinsley

customer_reviews.title: Very good flat screen tv
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it now for a couple of months. Works perfect and I love the built in Wifi to access amazon prime and you tube. I would recommend this TV for the price and value of it.
customer_reviews.author: Max Kolbe

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff for the price
customer_reviews.text: What do you say really? Its a huge TV at a good price. It has the right apps built in and looks great. It does seem a hair soft in the image but i will keep playing with the settings till it fits
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these for our conference rooms. They are monsterous and delivered with care. Over the years I have had TV's that do not want to sync when 40+ft HDMI cables are used. This model seems to work perfectly fine with a wide range of computers / laptops. Plenty of inputs... bright... thin for it's size... pretty solid. Con - The initial setup is a PITA. The remote isn't intuitive and you are forced to jump through some hoops before the TV can be used. I can't speak to the "smart" features of the TV... don't use them.
customer_reviews.author: Doc1

customer_reviews.title: This tv lasted 58 months
customer_reviews.text: The TVs power backlight board died in less then 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnxx

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. Stopped working 13 months!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Stopped working 13 months after purchase and Vizio's response it that it's out of warranty. To only guarantee a $1600 tv will work for 12 months is ridiculous. So unless you have tons of cash to blow don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Lang

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Bought it through Amazon, they contracted it to be delivered by a third party. They delivered it without incident and opened the box so I could inspect it and power it up. Once satisfied they left and I have been very happy with the quality of the picture and sound. I mounted it above my fireplace which was not difficult.
customer_reviews.author: misty sileno

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: had some issues with small white dots on the screen. TV was replaced twice by warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky P.

customer_reviews.title: Still Working Great..
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TV with no issues close to the 2 year mark. Bought it November 25 2012 and it still looks as good as when i bought.
customer_reviews.author: anekemei

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv, and the internet functions are great! The stand could be a little sturdier, but we plan to mount so that wont be an issue much longer!
customer_reviews.author: Lisslu504

customer_reviews.title: two yeas after purchase - bad panel - cannot fix
customer_reviews.text: The TV broke down Sept 2015, two yeas after purchase - bad panel - cannot fix. DO NOT BUY VISIO - JUNK TV!
customer_reviews.author: Marion M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Works Great! We bought two of these as screens for our church. They work beautifully. The quality is great as well. We are looking for another one with a price as good as this one was. (Black Friday)
customer_reviews.author: deal seeker

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: I can"t stand that the speakers lips are not synchronized with the sound playing. I have done the trouble shooting steps several times and fixed it. It works for a while correctly and then it reverts to the same problem again. I am sick of fixing it. I like the picture quality and the ease to connect to Netflix. I also like the help menu appears on the TV screen so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen J. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Have had the TV for about a month. Amazon's delivery service worked as advertised. I had no problem with the setup and the picture has been great. Can't beat the price, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: R. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Best tv I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Great picture,looks dynamic in any room.has tons of features,we put ours on the wall in our livingroom and it looks fantastic.price was excellent,compares to Costco without tax and even having to pick it up ur selves.the delivery service is wonderful.sets it up,takes it out of the box,and is extremely nice,and mannerly.i highly recommend this tv.its huge and wonderful.we absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful TV
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy the TV along with its ease of operation. I found no problems setting up controls nor later adding a surround system to the TV
customer_reviews.author: Ronny G.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Model...DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this model.... I did and just like all the others reviews the picture went blank with audio. Called Vizio and they replaced with the same model....and yes same thing happen again. This is a bad model.....get a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was a little skeptical about buying a tv online
customer_reviews.text: But not anymore! First I don't work for Vizio nor Amazon. I have had zero issues with the TV. Works great, hooked even old stuff to it. Bose adaptive sound system. Again zero issues. TV was delivered by two people very polite even ensured my carpet did not get dirty since he pointed out the bottom of the box was dirty. Very careful in the hallways. I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Cinci

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: for under 2K what is there to complain about. No it is not a 10K TV. I have 8K still in my pocket. It does have a better picture than my 3 year old Samsung 50" 550 which cost about 3K. It does have a nice picture. I does have reasonable sound. The picture controls work well and once I had it dialed in I was quite happy. I have 4 Vizio's in my home (yes we watch a lot of TV). All of them have worked well. When I purchased my first Vizio I was VERY skeptical. But I heard a very interesting interview on NPR and decided to give them a shot. I have not looked back since.
customer_reviews.author: William3000

customer_reviews.title: Replacement after only 9 months use.
customer_reviews.text: Had to have the unit repaired less than a year after purchase. The company was very nice about scheduling the fix and ultimately replacement. Picture isn't as good as my Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: John Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Good TV
customer_reviews.text: It works great with a good picture. We haven't used all of the things that it will do as of yet, but will in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: William Kelley

customer_reviews.title: So far, I'm delighted
customer_reviews.text: Vizio may be the bargain brand, but I am really happy with the product and see no quality difference between it and other more-expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: NealR2000

customer_reviews.title: do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: in less than 6 months the screen went white. I bought new and would think it still has its manufacturers warranty, but I am told it does not. what a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: WOOKIE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price. Best TV I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this TV. Great picture and remote is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: BeechDriver

customer_reviews.title: Great tv, large size.  Good value.
customer_reviews.text: 8 months into ownership of this very large tv, I still love it. Crisp sharp picture, easy to use smart tv mode. Tons of inputs for different devices. Great purchase, very happy!
customer_reviews.author: bigdaddyjavy

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big
customer_reviews.text: Unit works as advertised. It has a good picture. We had a problem with the delivery but the Amazon large purchase department took care of all issues. For the last year i have not shopped at bestbuy and will keep shopping at Amazon. I love Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: George Rodriguez

product_meta.title: VIZIO E701i-A3 70-inch 1080p Razor LED Smart HDTV (2013 Model)
product_meta.description: This season, go big with VIZIO! The E-Series 70-Inch Class Razor LED Smart TV is shattering the mold in a way only VIZIO can, with high-quality design and picture at the best value. Enjoy crystal-clear action and eye-popping images in 1080p Full HD resolution with 120Hz refresh rate with smooth motion. A slim frame design with ultra thin profile makes this a stunning entertainment centerpiece in any living space. VIZIO Internet Apps with built-in Wi-Fi gives you instant access to a world of streaming movies, TV shows, music, and more all at the push of a button on the smart remote with keyboard. This 70-Inch Class Razor LED Smart TV gives you more of what you love about TV with all the brilliant picture quality and world-class support you'd expect from America's LCD HDTV Company.
feature_bullets: VIZIO Internet Apps Instantly enjoy online movies, TV shows, music, apps and more
Razor LED for richer colors and more vivid details in an ultra thin design
TV without stand (Width x Height x Depth): 62.56'' x 36.49'' x 2.35'' , TV with stand (Width x Height x Depth): 62.56'' x 38.41'' x 12.56''
Built-in Wi-Fi for easy internet access

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars472 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
